name: HUNTER Digital
tagline: More Clicks. More Conversions. More Customers.
description:
Founded in 2010, Hunter Digital is a digital marketing and online optimization agency that brings over two decades of experience helping Ecommerce businesses grow through smart, measurable marketing.   
Experts in the online space, search marketing (certified by Google®), search optimization, performance marketing, conversion optimization and online strategy;  Hunter provide unsurpassed online knowledge and best-in-class digital marketing techniques that provide your brand quantifiable results and optimal ROI.  With a long history in the digital space, we know how to best maximize results.
